azureDevOps.itemQuery: ([System.WorkItemType] = "User Story" or [System.WorkItemType] = "Bug") AND [System.TeamProject] == "Your Project" AND [System.AreaPath] UNDER "Team Project\Team Name"

forecasts.name: Release 24.10
forecasts.remainingBacklogQuery: ([System.WorkItemType] = "User Story" or [System.WorkItemType] = "Bug") AND [System.TeamProject] == "Your Project" AND ([System.State] <> "Closed" AND [System.State] <> "Removed") AND [System.AreaPath] UNDER "Team Project\Team Name" AND [System.Tags] CONTAINS "Release 24.10"

forecasts.name: Sprint Goal
forecasts.remainingBacklogQuery: ([System.WorkItemType] = "Product Backlog Item" or [System.WorkItemType] = "Bug") AND [System.TeamProject] == "Your Project" AND ([System.State] <> "Closed" AND [System.State] <> "Removed") AND [System.AreaPath] UNDER "Team Project\Team Name" AND [System.Tags] CONTAINS "Sprint Goal"
